column5: Does anyone know how long the walleye season goes in this Zone?
The Zone 17 walleye season runs from 27 May 2016 to 31 March 2017. Catch limit is 8. Size limit is 14.6 inches to 20.9 inches, one of which can be more than 20.9 inches.

I was under the impression that it ended in sept. most outfitters will not take you after the 2nd week in sept must be a bad weather thing. thanks Retire 55 We may make the treck to Doda in the fall,I need to check if (Guy) up dated his outfittership
Wow....I'm surprised that an outfitter would turn away clients. Maybe he has moose or deer hunters but there should be no difference, money is the same.

It's been a few years (maybe 7-10) since we stayed with Guy on DodaHopefully they upgraded as the motors were extremely old and the one cabin they were renting had a large hole in the floorI know Guy is not flying anymore is he really still outfitting?RedSent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
As Doda is a public lac, I will be camping on the lac myself, No outfitter needed Thanks for the replies
